_header: Hold up our young king Ave benigna
Subjects: Henry VI, coronation; occasional verse; historical verse
_description: On the Coronation of Henry VI (1429) — 59 lines in couplets

BLLan285.First Lines:
Holde vp oure yong kyng Aue benignaAnd sende vs peas in oure londe.
                    Aue Regina…
BLLan285.Last Lines:
…And god coomforth that mykill hath loostThat was woon with
                    woorship late nevir be loost
BLLan285.Note: A balade made of the same kynge (f. 5v)

PierpontM775.First Lines:
HOlde vp oure yonge kynge aue benignaAnd sende vs pees in oure
                    londe aue regina…
PierpontM775.Last Lines:
…And good comforte that mekil hath losteThat was wonne with
                    worschipe late neuer be loste…
PierpontM775.Note: 30 couplets; written for coronation of Henry VI.
